M

Message - class goat.core.Message.
This class encapsulates an IRC Message.
Message(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class goat.core.Message
The most low level way of creating a new message, this requires some knowledge of the IRC RFC. prefix can be left empty (but not null) with most outgoing messages.
Message(String) - Constructor for class goat.core.Message
This is the preferred form of parsing a message from the network.
MessageDispatcher - class goat.core.MessageDispatcher.
Takes Messages off the inqueue and dispatches them to appropriate Modules
MessageDispatcher(MessageQueue, ModuleController) - Constructor for class goat.core.MessageDispatcher
 
MessageQueue - class goat.core.MessageQueue.
A threadsafe queue of Messages.
MessageQueue() - Constructor for class goat.core.MessageQueue
 
Module - class goat.core.Module.
The superclass of all Goat modules.
Module() - Constructor for class goat.core.Module
 
ModuleCommands - class goat.module.ModuleCommands.
 
ModuleCommands() - Constructor for class goat.module.ModuleCommands
 
ModuleController - class goat.core.ModuleController.
Loads and unloads Modules.
ModuleController(MessageQueue) - Constructor for class goat.core.ModuleController
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class goat.Goat
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class goat.core.SavePassword
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class goat.core.ServerConnection
 
messageType() - Method in class goat.core.Module
 
messageType() - Method in class goat.module.GoatSay
 
messageType() - Method in class goat.module.Hal
 
messageType() - Method in class goat.module.Help
 
modCommand - Variable in class goat.core.Message
The first word of the content of the message - eg the "command" that modules may be interested in
modControl - Variable in class goat.module.ModuleCommands
 
modTrailing - Variable in class goat.core.Message
All the trailing part of the message beyond the first word which may be the module command
